author: Simon Difford
description: This cocktail, which is popular in the city from which it takes its name, was originally made with French dry vermouth but since the turn of the century has been made with Italian sweet vermouth. I've opted for the 'perfect' solution with 50% dry and 50% sweet vermouths.
name: Vancouver

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
